upgrades.changelog:
Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10, 2.20, 2.30.
* Updated SDK from 7.19.3 to 7.24.1

Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10, 2.20, 2.30.
* Updated SDK from 7.19.3 to 7.24.1
* Added Long Range support for Europe

Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10, 2.20.
* Resolved charging and battery-related issues: fixed an issue where there was no LED activity after initially connecting the device to the charger.
* Added new parameters 8 - Battery Reporting Frequency and 9 - Battery Reporting Threshold.

Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10, 2.20.
* Resolved charging and battery-related issues: fixed an issue where there was no LED activity after initially connecting the device to the charger.
* Added new parameters 8 - Battery Reporting Frequency and 9 - Battery Reporting Threshold.

Includes firmware versions: 2.0, 2.10
* Updated parameter names and short descriptions in the Configuration Command Class to match the Advanced Setting Article.
* Updated the SmartStart inclusion via QR code: The ZEN37 arrives in deep sleep mode out of the box.
